Package gobblin.compaction.mapreduce.avro

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AvroCombineFileSplit
    A subclass of CombineFileSplit.
    AvroKeyCombineFileRecordReader
    A subclass of AvroKeyRecordReader.
    AvroKeyCompactorOutputCommitter
    Class used with MRCompactorAvroKeyDedupJobRunner to rename files as they are being committed.
    AvroKeyCompactorOutputFormat<T>
    Class used with MRCompactorAvroKeyDedupJobRunner as an entirely normal AvroKeyOutputFormat, except that the outputted file names contain a timestamp and a count of how many records the file contains in the form: {recordCount}.{timestamp}.avro
    AvroKeyDedupReducer
    Reducer class for compaction MR job for Avro data.
    AvroKeyMapper
    Mapper class for compaction MR job for Avro data.
    AvroKeyRecursiveCombineFileInputFormat
    A subclass of CombineFileInputFormat for Avro inputfiles.
    MRCompactorAvroKeyDedupJobRunner
    A subclass of MRCompactorJobRunner that configures and runs MR compaction job for Avro data.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AvroKeyDedupReducer.EVENT_COUNTER  
    AvroKeyMapper.EVENT_COUNTER
